ValidationRule.description: Created for YODA. Fields that are required for the "Qualify" stage of Opportunities in the "Product" record type.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( NOT( $Setup.Bypass_Settings__c.Bypass_Validation_Rules__c ), ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Qualify(SQL)'),
OR ( ISPICKVAL(Category_of_Interest__c,""), ISBLANK( End_User__c), ISBLANK(Amount) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: To mark 'Qualify' stage as complete, please ensure below key fields are populated: • Category of Interest • End User • End User Country • Amount
